formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. Percent retained on sieve i: P_i = \\frac{w_i}{\\sum_{k=1}^{n} w_k}\\times 100 2. Cumulative percent retained up to sieve i: C_i = \\sum_{j=1}^{i} P_j 3. Percent passing on sieve i: F_i = 100 - C_i 4. Fineness Modulus (fine aggregate): FM = \\frac{\\sum C_{\\#4,\\#8,\\#16,\\#30,\\#50,\\#100}}{100} 5. Particle sizes at fraction passing (log interpolation): \\log_{10}(D_p) = \\log_{10}(d_1) + (\\log_{10}(d_2)-\\log_{10}(d_1))\\cdot \\frac{p-F_1}{F_2-F_1} 6. Uniformity and Curvature Coefficients: C_u = \\frac{D_{60}}{D_{10}}, \\quad C_c = \\frac{D_{30}^2}{D_{10}\\cdot D_{60}}

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
